content.description: Sit start as for the problem The Razor, move your left hand up to a distant crimp sidepull and your right out to a small bump on the face, hike your feet up, crank to the lip, and top out.
content.location: This ascends the left side of the boulder and middle of the face in the small alcove.

content.description: Sit start with a small right hand crimp and a left hand bump. Move up to two text book crimps and then to a slopey topout.
content.location: This ascends the left arete/face in the small alcove.

content.description: Sit start with a really low left hand crimp and a higher right hand sloper. Pop to the arete, move up, and top out.
content.location: This ascends the arete about 5-6 feet left of the problem Bullshit and Beer on the backside of the 18 foot boulder

content.description: Start matched on the slopey shelf with a good rail for your foot below. Go up left to the nice, rounded, sidepull jug and then up right to the rounded gaston jug. Top out. This might feel harder for shorter folks, but I'm sure there's a heel hook in there for you somewhere.
content.location: This is located on the boulder in the back of the small alcove of Big Mario, to the left of the problems The Razor and Seed Money.

content.description: Sit start with hands on barely there slopey holds, use the low right rock that holds up the boulder for feet, crank up, and top out.
content.location: This ascends the right side of the boulder in the small alcove.

content.description: Crouch start about 5-6 feet left of the problem The Burning Question. Climb up the patina.
content.location: On the 18 foot Big Mario Boulder.

content.description: Sit start the 18 foot blunt right arete with Mario spraypainted on it. Move up and slightly left to top out the the tall, proud arete.
Located on the backside of the 18 foot boulder.Sit start about 4 feet left of the problem Locked and Loaded. Traverse left and up.

An 18 foot boulder perched on the hill with another boulder leaning against it which forms a small alcove.Please see the Access Issue Notice above and do not climb on this boulder until access has been resolved.
